'''Forest Watcher's Choice''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Mushroom Hodgepodge]] with [[Tighnari]].

Forest Watcher's Choice increases all party members' defense by 151 for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
